paper_title: Uncertainty-aware phase prediction of RMPEAs via mixture density networks

claims.claim: The R2 score of the MDN model trained for Sigma-phase prediction on the testing dataset, using the weighted mean of the Gaussian components, is 0.89
instruction: The code loads the MDN model, evaluates it on the testing dataset, computes the R2 score, and prints the result
Verify that the R2 score is 0.89
